meanings.def: a system for finding information on the internet, in which documents are connected to other documents
examples: The service is available to anyone with access to the web.
on the Web I found the information on the Web.
I did a Web search to find the best price.
A Web search brought up 900 hits.
I found this survey on the Web.
Many people use the Web to make their travel plans.

meanings.def: a fine net of thread made by a spider to catch insects
examples: A spider had spun a perfect web outside the window.

meanings.def: a complicated pattern of things that are closely connected to each other
examples: We were caught in a tangled web of relationships.
She discovered a web of intrigue in the company.
More and more people were drawn into his web of deceit.
The mass media form a web of communications.
An increasingly complex web of legislation has been considered.
Investigations have begun into a web of corruption within the government.

meanings.def: a piece of skin that joins the toes of some birds and animals that swim, for example ducks and frogs
